document_data.name: Seatower of Balduran
document_data.mainbody: The massive '''Seatower of Balduran''' rested on a rocky island in the bay of [[Baldur's Gate]].
document_data.History:
[[File:Seatower of Balduran.png|thumb|''A scenic view of the Seatower of Balduran and the [[Gray Harbor]].'']]
Named after [[Balduran]], the tower could be reached by a bridge from the western shore linking it to the mainland. It was used as a barracks, naval base, dungeon, and fortress.
document_data.Interior: It had a full armory and catapults to battle hostile ships, and a massive chain which could be stretched from it to the outermost wharf on the east side to bar the harbor to invaders.
